title: Whacky hand-drawn style
content:
Anybody recognize this? It looks hand-drawn, but repeating characters appear to be identical, except for the angle, so I'm thinking it's actually a font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415111710im_/http:/typophile.com/files/longsignfont_6300.jpg)
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content: This appears to be in the style of the hundreds of fonts produced by scrapbooking companies. [Lettering Delights](http://web.archive.org/) is one.

Thanks! Lots of stuff in the same vein, but no match, unfortunately.

(BTW, there is a typo in your link tag. Here's a working one... [http://www.letteringdelights.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415111710/http:/www.letteringdelights.com/ "http://www.letteringdelights.com/") )
